entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NW 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
